trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana has a task for a helpful adventurer.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_TODO_00<tab>Throw the acrid-smelling powder on signal fires.
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_ESHANA_000_000<tab>Are you feeling helpful, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? The hour has come to call in the patrols, but I cannot leave my ssstation.

TEXT_BANANA401_03050_ESHANA_000_001<tab>I would be grateful if you could head out and throw thisss powder onto our sssignal fires─the sssmoke will let our ssscouts know that fresh patrols are on the way to relieve them.
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_ESHANA_000_003<tab>Here. I'll mark the places on your map where the fires are to be found. A trifling tasssk, I know, but I appreciate your aid nonetheless.
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You hear the voice of an alerted scout from the direction of the Velodyna River.

TEXT_BANANA401_03050_ANANTASOLDIERA03050_000_011<tab>(-Distant Scout-)Ah, finally! I've been aching for a nice cup of tea and <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((a comfortable ssspot to sssit)) ((a ssspot in the shade)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((a ssspot in the shade)) ((a comfortable ssspot to sssit)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_ANANTASOLDIERA03050_000_012<tab>(-Distant Scout-)I hope the next ssscout has more luck tracking that big antlion than I did...
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_ANANTASOLDIERB03050_000_013<tab>(-Nearby Scout-)Already? My report will be a dull one, but I sssuppose those are the mossst welcome.
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_ANANTASOLDIERB03050_000_014<tab>(-Nearby Scout-)Time to head back. I needed to sharpen my blade again in any case.
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>You hear the beating wings of a griffin approaching from the direction of Virdjala...
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>You hear the steady clomp of booted feet approaching from the direction of Virdjala...
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_RESISTANCESOLDIERC03050_000_018<tab><cough> Oof, that stuff doesn't half make your eyes water. Thanks for the signal!
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_ESHANA_000_020<tab>Thank you. Our patrols range far and wide out here on the border, and lines of communication can be difficult to maintain.

TEXT_BANANA401_03050_ESHANA_000_021<tab>Griffins fly ssswiftly, of courssse, but a sssignal fire does the job even fassster. Even if the sssmoke does reek like a pile of marid...ahem, well it cannot be helped.
TEXT_BANANA401_03050_ESHANA_000_022<tab>If you don't mind ssstretching your legs, I could probably use your help the next time we call in the ssscouts.
